data.title: Assertions it gdscript
data.body:
It is useful to write assertions in code. @reduz uses it in everywhere
Example:

``` C++
ERR_FAIL_INDEX(p_line,text.size());
ERR_FAIL_COND(p_char<0);
```

In gdscript I write things like 

``` Python
if targetCell == null:
        print("ERROR: isPossibleMove :: target cell is null")
```

I think it should be standard feature like in core. If assert fails then the callstack should be shown.

data.title: script editor feature request: use Alt+arrows to move selected line(s)
data.body:
Feature request:

Pressing Alt + Up or Alt + Down should move the current line or selected lines up or down in the code.

Pressing Alt + Right or Alt + Left should add a tab indent or remove a tab indent for the current line or selected lines.

data.title: Allow use double as real_t
data.body:
Allow use double as real_t(fix compile errors)
Marshal always store/load float in file
ResourceFormatBinary compatible float/double format
GDScript parser automate detect int or real_t(if expression value out of int range)

This feature default is disabled

data.title: compilation fails on some systems
data.body: Compilations fails on Gentoo. Anyway, multiprocessing module is only needed if the spawn_jobs are indicated on the command line.

data.title: Background color doesn't change on Help page in editor
data.body:
Hello. 
Godot editor support customization of editor's color scheme. It is really cool feature. 
I changed color scheme from dark background with light font to light background with dark font. Check the screen please: http://itmages.com/image/view/1638062/a64dfcf5

But when you change color scheme of script editor it strange work on Help page. 
Help page still uses default background color, but font color it uses from script editor. Check this screenshot please: http://itmages.com/image/view/1638064/11bfe00e

So. 
Either Help page need use all color setting from script editor (Help page need to use script editor's background color), or Help page need use always default colors. 
Else Help page become to be unreadable if you prefer to use light background in script editor. 

I understand that you have really much important problems but this issue do work with Godot for people with eye problems (like me) really hard. 
It is not urgently. Just look possible solutions in a future please. 

Thanks. 
Oleg.

data.title: pair symbols tool basic imp
data.body:
A tool which adds pair symbols for "(", "[", "{" and so on. Works pretty much the same as others editors. 
It is disabled by default.

data.title: #298 imp
data.body: Try to tab lines and undo/redo after.

data.title: Editor needs file renaming with automatic refactoring
data.body: I've found that is quite impossible for me to work without reorganizing the filesystem structure of the project, and it is impossible to do that without an automation that addresses changing inter file references, so I've made a simple python script that moves files and automatically changes references to that file in the others. The script only works with non-compressed resources files and it is enough for me. However I think that such a functionality should be provided by default in the editor itself, possibly in the filesystem view panel.

data.body:
I made a simple project with a button and it crushes when I "touch" it in android emulator.
I am not sure is it a bug or I did something wrong.

https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/34699053/godot_touch_test.zip

data.title: Scaling with particles doesn't work
data.body:
I try to made a compose in a Node2D, inside it have some Sprites and a Particle emitter.
When I scale the Node2D the tree of nodes get the transformation, but the particle emitter doesn't!

data.title: Fix Popup._fix_size
data.body: Use global coord and viewport's size for locate

data.title: added missing include for imagemap
data.body: I really don't know how this got missed, or how my code was compiling..

data.title: stops running process when quitting editor
data.body:
I noticed a bug where I could close Godot while I was running a project, and the project would continue to run.

If the program was left running and then ran into an error, or if an error was caught by the debugger and then I quit Godot, I could no longer close the running project without manually killing it.
This fixes that problem by essentially hitting the Stop button automatically just prior to quitting the editor.

data.title: added bindings for InputMap (closes #283)
data.body:
Added GDScript bindings for InputMap.

Closes #283

data.title: print_tree function doesn't work.
data.body:
The following example:

``` python
func _ready():
    add_child(Node2D.new())
    add_child(Node2D.new())
    get_child(0).add_child(Node2D.new())
    print(get_child_count())
    print_tree()
```

outputs '2' for the get_child_count() call, but there is no output from print_tree.
Running on 64 bit Linux.

data.title: Add string format function
data.body:
add 'format' function for GDScript,
Usage:
    format("{0} {1} {2}", "1111", "2222", "3333")
Output:
    1111 2222 3333

Format "{?}", ? = argument index, argument can pass any type(string/int/Vector/etc...)

data.title: Add comment('//') line processing for json parser
data.body:
Add comment('//') line processing for json parser
Imp set_video_mode under windows platform
Register print_line for script

data.title: add custom text capability to ProgressBar node (closes #276)
data.body:
This adds a text property to ProgressBar nodes, allowing to override the default percentage text.
The property can be set in the editor, and updated on demand using the set_text() method.

closes #276

data.title: 2D scene snap settings save
data.body: Apologies, if you're receiving spam about this. I moved these changes out of my master and into their own branch. I'm still getting the hang of git and github.

data.title: Fix export translation(can't save pot file)
Add 'center' anchor option for Control
data.body:
Add 'center' anchor options for control, use control's center coord(not left top) for rotate/scale.
this is useful for ui animation(rotate/scale a control)

data.title: add display/resizable support to Linux
data.body: add display/resizable support to Linux

data.title: Battery Notification
data.body: Is there any form of battery monitor built in? If not, how much work would it be to add such a feature. I know it's not a major feature, but still nice to be able to say in an application "Your battery is low, please save and quit, or find the nearest power source."

data.title: Add Rotation/Scale for Controls
data.body:
Add transform/rot+transform/scale properties for Control, most useful in ui animate
Add Image missing bind(put_pixel, convert)
Add dialog/ok_text/cancel_text(Ok/Cancel Button's caption)
Update dialog/text to MultiLine

data.title: changing node type wipes its connections
data.body:
If you change a node type in a scene, any connections it has (set with the connections editor tool) are erased. I think it should retain the connections.

Example: Connect a button's pressed event to a parent EmptyControl (or whatever) node, then change the parent's type to Control (or whatever), and the connection is now gone.

data.title: GDScript Class references from methods
data.body:
Lets consider this code:

``` python
class FieldPos:
    var row = 0
    var col = 0
    func copy():
        return FieldPos.new() # identifier not found: FieldPos
class Move:
    var from = null
    var to = null
    func foo():
        return FieldPos.new() # identifier not found: FieldPos
```

It is not a correct script but I would like to write such things.

data.title: save and load Use Snap and Snap (Pixels) settings to scene file
data.body: Small patch that saves and loads the 2D editor options "Use Snap" and "Snap (Pixels)" to the scene file. Previously, only "Use Pixel Snap" was persistent.

data.body: User can occasionally type something not in English. In this case editor shows nothing and a "unknown character" error appears. It is very strange. In my case it is Russian
